item.title: Calculators
item.description: Android Calculator Making a precise calculator is not trivial. While \(10^{100} + 1 - 10^{100} = 1\), iOS’s calculator gives back \(0\). explores how Android’s calculator gets this right courtesy of . Real number representations are fundamentally imprecise because we can’t squeeze in infinitely many real numbers into a finite number of bits.
